title: Hiver & Victor with The Casumo Company Limited (AI Addon)

signals.problem_statement: The AI tagging feature may not effectively handle multiple languages, which is crucial for the finance department that deals with invoices in different languages.
signals.customer_ask: How can we teach Hiver to understand several languages at the same time?
signals.context: Finance department handling 30-50 emails daily in multiple languages
signals.suggested_solution: Implement AI tagging that can recognize and categorize emails based on different languages.

signals.problem_statement: The current system requires manual intervention to sort emails by language, which is inefficient.
signals.customer_ask: Can AI tagging be used for language specificity to automatically assign emails to the right team member?
signals.context: Finance department with team members fluent in different languages
signals.suggested_solution: Use AI tagging to automatically assign emails based on the language detected.

signals.problem_statement: The team struggles with managing and documenting processes effectively, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.customer_ask: How can we centralize our knowledge and processes to make them more accessible?
signals.context: Finance department with scattered documentation across different platforms
signals.suggested_solution: Utilize the co-pilot feature to consolidate and streamline process documentation.
